thought: I have defined and implemented all necessary functions and workflows to fulfill the user request: manual trigger, search for 'ProAgentWorkspace' folder, list files inside it, and send the formatted file list to Slack #general channel. The workflow has been tested with sample data and works correctly, sending the file list messages to Slack.
plan: Wait for user feedback for any further improvements or fixes.
criticism: The workflow handles the main cases well, including folder not found and empty folder cases. The only minor limitation is no pagination for very large folders, but the limit of 100 files is reasonable for most cases.
